about_the_game:
The story of this game is purely fictitious and has nothing to do with any characters, organizations, countries, places, or events that exist in reality. Please do not take the right seat

*If the game cannot be started normally, please check the control panel-region-non-UNICODE program language, this game needs to be set to Chinese (China)*

Overview


"Hey hey hey, pal, don't you know that after the founding of the People's Republic of China, you are not allowed to become non-human?"
"But Sir, I'm an elite who was born before the founding of the country!"
"The state has regulations that every non-human must go to the Sixth Residents Administration to register as a household!"
In 2018, materialism and the scientific viewpoint of seeking truth from facts have become the sacred and unshakable truth in Tu Lei's heart for that ordinary high school student.
However, by chance, a god fox who called himself "nine tails" broke into his materialistic world.
Whether this is a good thing or a bad thing, Tu Lei has no answer in his heart for the time being. He still doesn't know that there is an exciting adventure waiting for him ahead.

All characters in this game are adults

Game introduction


Huan yu



(CV. 菊花花)

The god fox who calls herself "nine tails", it is said that she can bless the people of a party with good weather and peace, and the emperor who has received her approval can achieve hegemony and bring good news to the world. It has been sleeping for more than 1,000 years, but by chance, the seal was broken and awakened. Even so, graceful posture and inviolable majesty are still indispensable to her.
Although she's a god, if you treat each other with courtesy, a god known for his kindness will not show arrogance.

Chen Feiyu(?)



(CV. 闲踏梧桐)
Tu Lei's classmate, a JK who can be seen everywhere, is smart and versatile. She is usually a little careless and informal. She is addicted to a mobile game called "The Round Table of menghan". She gets very lazy when it doesn't matter to herself. Her favorite things are Tokusatsu, playing games, and junk food.
However, there seems to be an unknown side hidden beneath that straight appearance.

Mysterious girl


(CV. 小眠)
The girl who appeared in Tu Lei's dreams many times always had a sad expression and seemed to have experienced very sad things. we don't know why she wears ancient costumes that are out of date, and call Tu Lei "brother". Her body is full of mysteries, but then again, it is doubtful whether the girl who appeared in the dream even existed... huh?

Production members

Planning:囧Z
original story:白银奔雷
Director:囧Z
Screenwriter/Script:白银奔雷, 囧Z
Character Proposal: 白银奔雷，千
Original painting:赤音铃, 童谣幻, CL
original mechanical design:小米
Mechanical design:白银奔雷,阿枭, 金鱼
UI:栖霞散人
Dubbing coordinator:闲踏梧桐
Program:Sliots, 囧Z
Sound effects/post recording:囧Z
The mastermind behind the scenes:Mr. Xue, who did not want to be named
Encyclopedia:浅川樱

weibo: HCGstudio-我们真的是做黄油的
Communication and discussion QQ group: 9906270

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains general adult content: sexy poses or costumes, violent content such as fights or kidnappings, potentially frightening or disgusting horror content, illegal use of narcotics

name: Heaven's Fox

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows7 32bit
  • Processor: intel core i5 8000 series
  • Memory: 1000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows10 64bit
  • Processor: intel core i7 10000 series
  • Memory: 1500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: After a staunch materialist boy witnesses the ghosts and spirits, how will his world view be shaken? The nine-tailed fox who is high above, the classmates who laugh and play, the mysterious girl in the dream, which one of them would you like to start a thrilling and exciting adventure with?
